about_the_game:
Megalothymia - Jupiter's Absolute Defense Sphere - Heaven's Fall" is a space war 3D shooting game set in the solar system of the near future.
As the commander of the War Monger, an independent fleet of the Unity, you take on the fleet of the space exploration conglomerate Lumberyard in a battle for control of the planet.

You command your own fleet and aim for victory in a complex battlefield of many-to-many battleships, attacks, and explosions. In addition to attacking from your own ships, you must also be strategic in directing your fleet in order to gain the upper hand in the war. The game combines FPS and tactical elements to create a new kind of space warfare experience.

Players can enjoy a variety of stages such as Asteroids, Jupiter, Earth, Sun, and Mars, as well as different missions such as retreat lines, defensive battles, and sieges.

Your mission is to thwart Lumberyard's plot, which will be revealed as the battle progresses, and lead Unity to victory. Will you be able to fight through this war and chart the future?
